contextId.occurrenceNote: Some ancient texts have a different number of men. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-textvariants]])
contextId.glQuote: three men are looking for you

contextId.occurrenceNote: Some ancient authorities say "fasting and praying" instead of simply "praying." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-textvariants]])
